author: veithen
msg: AXIS2-4231: In AttachmentTest#testMultipleAttachments, construct DataHandlers from Java objects instead of (external) URLs. This avoids problems when running the tests on a machine without Internet access. Note that the way the DataHandlers are created is not relevant for the test case.

author: ogusakov
msg: [MERCURY-77] - got rid of nexus, all tests are now run against jetty + webdav servlet

author: veithen
msg: Replaced some fully qualified class names by unqualified ones.
